topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack 2.0: Creating an External Network

section.p: You must have an external network set up, for your Compute instances to reach the internet. The HPE Helion OpenStack installer provides an Ansible playbook that will create this network for use across your projects.

section.title: Run the Playbook
section.p: This playbook will query the Networking service for an existing external network, and then create a new one if you do not already have one:

entry.p: Optional. You can use this switch to specify the external network CIDR. If you choose not to this switch, or use a wrong value, the VMs will not be accessible over the network.
This CIDR will be from the EXTERNAL VM network.
